abstract: Stock market rises to record high in serene session.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were higher as investors worked through a few deals. The parent of Ann Taylor agreed to a takeover bid, and Endo International said it would buy Par Pharmaceutical.

headline.main: Modest Gain for the Market as Investors Consider Deal News
headline.print_headline: With Most Earnings Reported and Little to Sway Investors, the Market Inches to a Record

snippet: Stocks were higher as investors worked through a few deals. The parent of Ann Taylor agreed to a takeover bid, and Endo International said it would buy Par Pharmaceutical.
